T06D4065:194a-47: bstan bcos byed pas don ji lta ba bzhin ma

T06D4065:194b-0: ba bzhin ma yin @194b pa'i dpe bstan pa /
T06D4065:194b-1: dper na rang sems shes pa can //
T06D4065:194b-3: dper na srog chags rnams kyi rang gi sems 'das
T06D4065:194b-4: pa dang ma 'ongs pa shes pa yang don ji
T06D4065:194b-5: lta ba bzhin du ma yin te /
T06D4065:194b-6: de bzhin du rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis gzhan gyi
T06D4065:194b-7: sems shes pa yang don ji lta ba bzhin ma
T06D4065:194b-8: yin no // gzhan gyi sems rig pa zhes brjod
T06D4065:194b-9: pa ni rtogs so snyam pa'i dbang gis 'gyur ro
T06D4065:194b-10: yin no // // 'di ltar de dag gi rnal
T06D4065:194b-11: 'byor gyi dbang gis rang gi sems nyid gzhan gyi
T06D4065:194b-12: sems dang mtshungs pa'i rnam par gsal bar snang ba
T06D4065:194b-13: yin no // // 'byung ste / dper na de
T06D4065:194b-14: dag gi rnal 'byor gyi stobs kyis 'das pa dang
T06D4065:194b-15: ma 'ongs pa'i dngos po rnam pa gsal bar snang
T06D4065:194b-16: ba'i shes pa 'byung ba lta bu'o //
T06D4065:194b-17: de yang de dag gzung ba'i cha la gzhan gyi
T06D4065:194b-18: sems su sems pa na gzhan gyi sems rig go
T06D4065:194b-20: pha rol gyi dpe ma grub par bsams te /
T06D4065:194b-21: de yang ji ltar don ji lta ba bzhin du ma yin zhes dris so //
T06D4065:194b-22: gal te rang gi sems shes pa don med pa
T06D4065:194b-23: ji lta ba bzhin ma yin par grub na ni
T06D4065:194b-24: de'i tshe dper bstan pa yang rigs na /
T06D4065:194b-25: de nyid ma grub na ji lta ba bzhin ma yin /
T06D4065:194b-26: bstan bcos byed pas gnyi ga yang don ji lta ba bzhin ma yin pa'i gtan tshigs su /
T06D4065:194b-27: sangs rgyas kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T06D4065:194b-29: ji ltar de brjod du med pa'i bdag nyid du zhes bya pa la sogs pa smos so //
T06D4065:194b-30: rang gi sems de dang gzhan gyi sems de yang
T06D4065:194b-31: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ji ltar brjod
T06D4065:194b-32: du med pa'i bdag nyid du thugs su chud pa
T06D4065:194b-33: de bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos
T06D4065:194b-34: so // thugs su chud pa de bzhin du srog chags rnams kyis rang gi sems ma rig /
T06D4065:194b-35: rnal 'byor pas kyang gzhan gyi sems mi rig go //
T06D4065:194b-36: de lta bas na rang gi sems shes pa dang
T06D4065:194b-37: gzhan gyi sems shes pa gnyi ga yang don ji
T06D4065:194b-38: lta ba bzhin du ma yin no //
T06D4065:194b-40: rnal 'byor pas rang dang gzhan gyi sems brjod du
T06D4065:194b-41: med pa'i bdag nyid du ci'i phyir ma shes snyam
T06D4065:194b-43: log par snang ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos so //
T06D4065:194b-44: 'di ltar de dag gi sems de ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pas log pa'o //
T06D4065:194b-45: de ltar yang dag pa'i don du na de dag
T06D4065:194b-46: gi sems de ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang
T06D4065:194b-48: gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo'i sems la gnyis kyi rnam pa ni log pa yin no //
T06D4065:195a-1: gzung ba'i chas bsgribs pas rang dang gzhan gyi sems kyi ngo bo la srog chags rnams dang /
T06D4065:195a-2: rnal 'byor pas rang gi sems dang gzhan gyi sems
T06D4065:195a-3: brjod du med pa'i bdag nyid du ma rig ste
T06D4065:195a-4: / de dag rang gi gzung ba'i cha gnyis rang
T06D4065:195a-5: dang gzhan gyi sems lta bur rig pa na rang
T06D4065:195a-6: dang gzhan gyi sems rig go zhes rtog par byed
T06D4065:195a-7: / kyi / yang dag pa'i don du na rang
T06D4065:195a-8: dang gzhan gyi sems kyi rang gi ngo bo la
T06D4065:195a-10: dper na bum pa'i kha dog 'dra ba'i snam bu zhig gis bum pa g-yogs na mthong /
T06D4065:195a-11: snam bu mthong yang srog chags dag bum pa mthong
T06D4065:195a-12: ngo snyam du sems pa de bzhin du 'dir yang
T06D4065:195a-13: de ltar blta'o // gal te srog chags rnams dang
T06D4065:195a-14: rnal 'byor pa dag gi sems kyi ngo bo gnyis
T06D4065:195a-16: ci'i phyir gnyis kyi rnam par 'byung snyam pa la /
T06D4065:195a-17: gzung ba dang 'dzin ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T06D4065:195a-18: 'di ltar de dag gzung ba dang 'dzin par mngon par zhen pa ma spangs pa'i phyir /
T06D4065:195a-19: ji srid du de ma spangs pa de srid du
T06D4065:195a-20: sems kyi ngo bo gnyis su med du zin kyang
T06D4065:195a-21: gnyis kyi rnam par snang ngo //
T06D4065:195a-22: de'i phyir de ltar rnam par rig pa tsam la rgol ba ngan pa'i lan btab bo //
T06D4065:195a-23: ci'i phyir rnam par rig pa tsam la cung zad
T06D4065:195a-24: tsam zhig bshad kyi de rnam pa thams cad du
T06D4065:195a-25: ci'i phyir ma bshad snyam pa la /
T06D4065:195a-26: rnam par rig pa tsam gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T06D4065:195a-27: gang gis rab tu byed pa rnam par nges pa mtha' yas pa dang /
T06D4065:195a-28: gang gting mi dpogs shing zab pa'i rnam par rig
T06D4065:195a-29: pa tsam de'i rnam par rig pa tsam du 'grub
T06D4065:195a-30: pa gang yin pa de dag gis rang gi nus
T06D4065:195a-31: pa dang mthun par byas kyi /
T06D4065:195a-32: de'i rnam pa kun du ni so so'i skye bo rnams kyis bsam par mi nus te /
T06D4065:195a-33: 'di ltar de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyod yul kho na'o //
T06D4065:195a-34: bstan bcos byed pas tshigs su bcad pa tha ma'i phyed rnam par dgrol ba'i phyir /
T06D4065:195a-35: de'i rnam pa kun zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T06D4065:195a-36: de kho na ma mthong ba rtog pa'i dra ba
T06D4065:195a-37: ma dral ba bdag 'dra bas rnam par rig pa
T06D4065:195a-38: tsam de'i rnam pa thams cad bsam par mi nus
T06D4065:195a-39: so // ci'i phyir snyam pa la /
T06D4065:195a-40: rtog ge'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba smos so //
T06D4065:195a-41: 'di ltar don dam pa ni rtog pa'i yul ma yin no //
T06D4065:195a-43: de bas na de bsam par mi nus so //
T06D4065:195a-44: rnam par rig pa tsam ni don dam pa yin na ji ltar rtog ge'i yul du 'gyur /
T06D4065:195b-0: @195b gal te de kho na ma mthong ba dag
T06D4065:195b-1: gis rnam pa thams cad bsam par mi nus na
T06D4065:195b-2: de rnam pa thams cad du su'i spyod yul snyam
T06D4065:195b-3: pa la / sangs rgyas spyod yul lo zhes bya ba smos so //
T06D4065:195b-4: de nyid dgrol ba'i phyir de ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T06D4065:195b-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis de rnam pa thams cad du thugs su chud de /
T06D4065:195b-6: de bas na de dag gi spyod yul lo //
T06D4065:195b-7: de ci'i phyir de dag gi spyod yul snyam pa la /
T06D4065:195b-8: shes bya thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad la
T06D4065:195b-9: mkhyen pa thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i phyir ro zhes
T06D4065:195b-11: 'di ltar rnal 'byor pa'i gtsug gi nor bu sangs
T06D4065:195b-12: rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mkhyen pa ni shes
T06D4065:195b-13: bya thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad la thogs
T06D4065:195b-15: 'di ltar lag mthil du skyu ru ra bzhag pa bzhin du de dag 'jig rten pa dang /
T06D4065:195b-16: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos po thams cad mngon sum du mdzad do //
T06D4065:195b-17: de bas na de dag gang la yang thogs par ga la 'gyur te /
T06D4065:195b-18: 'di ltar shes bya la sgrib par byed pa'i thogs pa spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T06D4065:195b-19: nyi shu pa ni rnam phye bas //
T06D4065:195b-20: bdag gi dge ba kha ba dang //
T06D4065:195b-21: zla ba'i zer 'dra gang thob des //
T06D4065:195b-22: 'gro ba sangs rgyas grub par shog / nus la ltos te bgyis pas na //
T06D4065:195b-23: mi shes dbang gis cung zad du //
T06D4065:195b-24: mi 'drar bshad bar gyur na yang //
T06D4065:195b-25: mkhas pa rnams kyis bzod par mdzod //
T06D4065:195b-26: rab tu byed pa nyi shu ba'i 'grel bshad /
T06D4065:195b-27: slob dpon dul ba'i lhas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T06D4065:195b-29: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
